required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: REN-Project 2 Cigarette and E-cigarette Nicotine Content and E-liquid Flavors
clinical_study.official_title: Project 2: The Impact of Cigarette Nicotine Content, E-cigarette Nicotine Content, and E-cigarette Flavoring on Smoking Behavior

brief_summary.textblock: Project 2 will evaluate the impact of very low nicotine content cigarettes, e-cigarette nicotine content, and e-cigarette flavoring on cigarettes smoked per day, nicotine exposure, puff topography, discomfort/dysfunction, other health-related behaviors, nicotine/tobacco dependence, biomarkers of tobacco exposure, intention to quit, compensatory smoking, other tobacco use, cardiovascular function, and perceived risk. Project 2 will also evaluate differences between conditions in compliance with product use and the ability to abstain from cigarette smoking when provided a financial incentive for abstinence from combusted tobacco. This is not a treatment program for smoking.

secondary_outcome.description: Measure of number of days using assigned vaping device

other_outcome.measure: IVR Review and Timeline Followback and E-liquid Accountability
Number of choices to smoke in preference assessment task

other_outcome.description: Measure of relative reinforcement and substitution
Measure of hypothetical cigarette and vaping device use

other_outcome.measure: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale

other_outcome.description: Measure of cigarette exposure and compliance

other_outcome.measure: Environmental and Social Influences on Tobacco Use Questionnaire
other_outcome.description: Measure of smoking and vaping context
Measure of smoking and vaping context
Measure of smoking and vaping topography
Measure of perceived personal health risk

other_outcome.measure: Post-intervention changes in tobacco use behavior
other_outcome.description: Measure of 30-day tobacco use post-intervention of study products
Themes related to product use patterns, e-liquid flavor selection, non-compliance and general study feedback

arm_group.arm_group_label: NNC cigarette + moderate nicotine e-liquid + tobacco flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with normal nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with moderate nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from tobacco e-liquid flavors.

arm_group.arm_group_label: NNC cigarette + low nicotine e-liquid + tobacco flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with normal nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with very low nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from tobacco e-liquid flavors.

arm_group.arm_group_label: NNC cigarette + moderate nicotine e-liquid + variety flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with normal nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with moderate nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from tobacco and non-tobacco e-liquid flavors.

arm_group.arm_group_label: NNC cigarette + low nicotine e-liquid + variety flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with normal nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with very low or nicotine-free nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from tobacco and non-tobacco e-liquid flavors

arm_group.arm_group_label: VLNC cigarette + moderate nicotine e-liquid + tobacco flavor
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with very low nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with moderate nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from tobacco e-liquid flavors.

arm_group.arm_group_label: VLNC cigarette + low nicotine e-liquid +tobacco flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with very low nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with very low or nicotine-free nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from tobacco e-liquid flavors.

arm_group.arm_group_label: VLNC cigarette + moderate nicotine e-liquid + variety flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with very low nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with moderate nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from tobacco and non-tobacco e-liquid flavors.

arm_group.arm_group_label: VLNC cigarette + low nicotine e-liquid + variety flavors
arm_group.description: Participants are provided with very low or nicotine-free nicotine content tobacco Spectrum Cigarettes along with very low nicotine level e-liquid cartridges and can choose from tobacco and non-tobacco e-liquid flavors

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Smokers who have tried vaping multiple times.
- Generally good health.
Exclusion Criteria:
- If female, currently pregnant, trying to become pregnant or breastfeeding.
- Planning to quit smoking.
